comment:
* Linear Gradient (Java) Paint able to handle more than 2 points, as
     * {@link java.awt.GradientPaint} only supports 2 points and does not support Android's tile
     * modes.

methods.name: public java.awt.PaintContext createContext(java.awt.image.ColorModel colorModel, java.awt.Rectangle deviceBounds, java.awt.geom.Rectangle2D userBounds, java.awt.geom.AffineTransform xform, java.awt.RenderingHints hints)
private int getColor(float x, float y)
methods.comment: * Returns a color for an arbitrary point.

methodNames: public java.awt.PaintContext createContext(java.awt.image.ColorModel colorModel, java.awt.Rectangle deviceBounds, java.awt.geom.Rectangle2D userBounds, java.awt.geom.AffineTransform xform, java.awt.RenderingHints hints)
private int getColor(float x, float y)
